title: Envio Solana Config Schema
description: Schema for a YAML config for an envio Solana indexer

output.description: Path where the generated directory will be placed. By default it's 'generated' relative to the current working directory. If set, it'll be a path relative to the config file location.

handlers.description: Optional relative path to handlers directory for auto-loading. Defaults to 'src/handlers' if not specified.
